title: Get CAR MODEL VARIANT-is-variant-of Relationship
description:
* The ›is-variant-of‹ relationship for the selected CAR MODEL VARIANT is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* An empty response is returned when the selected CAR MODEL VARIANT has no ›is-variant-of‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a CAR MODEL VARIANT. -> Status Code \`404\`
